div.style: align-items: center; background-image: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(226, 226, 226, 0), rgba(201, 214, 255, 0)); color: rgba(235, 219, 178, 0.5); display: flex; font-family: "Segoe WPC", "Segoe UI", sans-serif; font-size: 13px; justify-content: center; padding-block: 0px; padding: 0px; padding-inline: 0px; -webkit-locale: "en";

animation-duration: 0.3s; animation-name: bounceF; animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.28, 0.84, 0.42, 1); border-radius: 5px; border-end-end-radius: 5px; border-end-start-radius: 5px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 0px 20px 60px 0px; display: flex; min-inline-size: 100px; min-width: 100px; overflow: hidden; transition-duration: 0.2s; transition-property: opacity;

align-items: center; background-color: rgb(50, 48, 47); block-size: 35px; border-start-end-radius: 5px; border-start-start-radius: 5px; border-top-left-radius: 5px; border-top-right-radius: 5px; cursor: default; display: flex; height: 35px; padding-block: 3px; padding: 3px 18px; padding-inline: 18px;

background-color: rgb(255, 95, 85); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(255, 189, 45); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; width: 10px;

background-color: rgb(37, 201, 63); block-size: 10px; border-radius: 50%; border-end-end-radius: 50%; border-end-start-radius: 50%; border-start-end-radius: 50%; border-start-start-radius: 50%; height: 10px; inline-size: 10px; margin-inline-end: 5px; margin-right: 5px; width: 10px;
background-color: rgb(50, 48, 47); display: flex; min-block-size: 150px; min-height: 150px; min-inline-size: 250px; min-width: 250px; padding-block: 10px; padding: 10px 18px; padding-inline: 18px;
display: flex; flex-direction: column; margin-inline-end: 15px; margin-right: 15px; padding-block-end: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; padding-inline-end: 5px; padding-right: 5px;

span.style: line-height: 19px; color: rgb(133, 133, 133); cursor: default; font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 14px;

div.style: color: rgb(235, 219, 178); background-color: rgb(50, 48, 47); font-family: Consolas, "Courier New", monospace; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19px; white-space: pre; display: block;

div.span: "pi is ${pi} took ${cast(time, f64) / 1000} seconds to compute."
"On average pi took ${avgTime / 10} seconds to compute."
